function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transformation of urban soundscape as a reduction in the sounds of capitalism","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anti-density discourse may reinforce overcrowding in homes due to insane rents.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to social distancing and lockdown measures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in city soundscape due to covid-19 containment measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Structural and political questions arising from the quietness of the city","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of public transportation and crowded areas in cities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stereotypical representations of city sounds and environments","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of attention to complexities, ironies, and potentialities of modernity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rigid polarities and flat totalisations in twentieth-century thinking","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of geographical sensibility in spatial storytelling","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of dialogue between individual contributors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of communication and dialogue in organizing cities and lives","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction with various individuals during the podcast project.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Personal and immediate contributions may lead to a lack of academic rigor in addressing contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anxiety and self-reflection can affect the ability to objectively analyze and address contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focusing on faraway lands may result in neglecting local contagious disease propagation issues","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate control over the quality of audio submissions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or consideration for contagious disease transmission during audio recording","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration for privacy and consent during recording.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interpreting vague instructions leading to different interpretations of the task","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of the task leading to off-topic submissions.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19 being used as a context for contributions without explicit request","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discussion of covid-19 pandemic and academic experts’ role","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Call for audio stories about covid-19 experiences","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global call for academic reports on covid-19 implications","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of audio material from multiple locations around the world may introduce contagious diseases from different regions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene practices in urban areas may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased speed of communication mediums leading to rapid spread of misinformation about diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration in new ways leading to the spread of unverified research findings or unreliable data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intersection of sonic and textual outputs leading to the misinterpretation of research findings or communication of inaccurate information.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of covid-19 on global north and south","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality and positionality in urban environments","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Struggles to make sense of experience under covid-19 in cities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases within the community radio station and podcast production environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases through close contact during podcast interviews and broadcasting activities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of multiple voices and perspectives in the commentary may lead to the propagation of conflicting information about covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International mobility of scholars increases the risk of spreading contagious diseases across borders.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid production and dissemination of the podcast project may amplify awareness of the impact of the covid-19 pandemic on cities, but may also spread misinformation or panic.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prevalence of depression and ptsd among quarantined people during the covid-19 outbreak","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Burden of the pandemic and prevalence of mental health problems","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of certain groups to mental health disturbances during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on unreliable or overwhelming information sources for pandemic-related information dissemination.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prevalence of psychological problems and associated factors during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Online surveys as the main method of information collection may trigger biases in participant selection, such as oversampling of certain demographics.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of specific populations in review studies may lead to the oversight of key findings related to vulnerable and underrepresented communities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear and direct information policies on pandemic management","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low quality and veracity of internet information","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excessive access to information leading to an 'infodemic'","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Factors associated with mental health disturbances , gender, age, income, social
